This page contains online book resources for instructors and students. You can contact us via email if you have any questions.

Solutions Manual

Solutions are available for Instructors. Please email us from an official university/academic email address to request the solutions manual.

Lecture Videos

You can access the lecture videos for the data mining course offered at RPI in Fall 2019.

Slides

Complete latex sources for all slides GitHub (latest). These are also available in ZIP format.

Implementation-based Projects

Implementation-based Projects Here are some implementation-based project ideas. You can use python or R, or any other language/software of your choice.

  • Contingency Table Analysis
